description: Your diplomatic skills allow you to impress others so much with Cha (Etiquette) tests that they will most likely completely forgive and forget any percieved strife or disagreement. (this will not work on foes currently engaged in combat)

name: Diplomacy: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Cha (Etiquette) tests.

name: Entertainment: Rank 2
description: Succeeding in Cha (Performance) tests now always result in characters tipping you based on how well you did, and how much they enjoyed your performance.

name: Entertainment: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Cha (Performance) tests.

name: Fishing: Rank 1
description: You have unloacked the ability to fish up common (TN = 13), uncommon (TN = 15), rare (TN = 17), super rare (TN = 19), and legendary (TN = 21) fish.

name: Fishing: Rank 2
description: If you have either the Dex (Sailing) focus or End (Swimming) focus you may add up to +1 to your Per (Touching) fishing test for each.

name: Fishing: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Per (Touching) tests.

name: Gambling: Rank 2
description: Whenever you fail a Cha (Gambling) test you can choose to go double or nothing to reroll to try again. If you win, you win double. If you lose, you lose double.

name: Gambling: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Cha (Gambling) tests.

name: Gymnastics: Rank 2
description: Whenever you receive falling damage you receive half the normal amount you would have taken.

name: Gymnastics: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Dex (Acrobatics) tests.

name: Heroism: Rank 2
description: When faced with deadly odds you stand courageously. Gain +1 to Hrt (Courage) tests for every foe that outnumbers you. (max +5)

name: Heroism: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Hrt (Courage) tests.

name: Intrigue: Rank 2
description: Succeeding a TN 17 Cha (Questioning) test will inspire you to be aware of the perfect question to ask your target. This question will be given you by the GM.

name: Intrigue: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Cha (Questioning) tests.

name: Investigation: Rank 2
description: Gain +2 towards detecting areas of criminal activity in an area as well as finding the locations of guards, cameras, and any other security measures.

name: Investigation: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Per (Searching) tests.

name: Jumping: Rank 1
description: You no longer need a running start to achieve maximum jumping height/distance

name: Jumping: Rank 2
description: You no longer need to roll a jumping test for heights under 2 meters, or distances under 6 meters

name: Jumping: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Str (Jumping) tests.

name: Leadership: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Cha (Leadership) tests.

name: Linguistics: Rank 1
description: Learn a second language of your choice from the same script of a language you speak.

name: Linguistics: Rank 2
description: Choose a script other than the one you are familiar with and learn the basics and alphabet as well as a rudimentary understanding of one of the languages of that script.

name: Linguistics: Rank 3
description: Learn a second language of your choice from any of the languages available. (can take this talent more than once)

name: Lying: Rank 2
description: Even when caught in a lie you are able to further lie your way out. Gain +2 to Cha (Deception) after being caught in a lie.

name: Lying: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Cha (Deception) tests.

name: Mechanics: Rank 2
description:
Succeeding a TN 17 Dex (Tinkering) test will allow you to understand how to remake machinery to be smaller and more compact. 
(examples: completely rebuilding a device smaller, making an existing device retractable, foldable, or telescoping)

name: Mechanics: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Dex (Tinkering) tests.

name: Medicine: Rank 2
description: You may now perform a First Aid action to attempt to cure a target of a debilitating effect or affliction. Roll vs the affliction's TN. (GM discretion)

name: Medicine: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Int (Medicine) tests.

name: Navigation: Rank 1
description: You are a trusted navigator. When you offer advice to others on a route to take or a path to avoid they are more likely to heed your advice. Gain +2 towards convincing others to take the route you suggest.

name: Navigation: Rank 2
description: You have memorized every map you have ever read. IF you have seen the map previously, it is impossible for you to get lost.

name: Navigation: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Wis (Navigation) tests.

name: Piloting: Rank 2
description:
Select one of the following: 
Ace - Vehicle weapons systems deal 1d6 extra damage
Racer - Your vehicle movement speed increases by 3
Smuggler - Vehicle stealth checks gain +2

name: Piloting: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Dex (Piloting) tests.

name: Riding: Rank 1
description: While mounted you are now immune to the knock prone stunt. You can't be dismounted against your will.

name: Riding: Rank 2
description: You may now wield all 2-handed weapons while mounted.

name: Riding: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Dex (Riding) tests.

name: Running: Rank 2
description: While Well Rested you gain +4 towards your End (Running) tests.

name: Running: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll End (Running) tests.

name: Sailing: Rank 1
description: Your sea legs and marine awareness make you more adept at fighting on water than land. Gain +1 Def and deal +1 extra damage while fighting aboard a nautical ship or boat.

name: Sailing: Rank 2
description: You have innate knack of knowing your ship inside and out. You will always be privy to changes made to your ship, the crew, or it's cargo.

name: Sailing: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Dex (Sailing) tests.

name: Scholarship: Rank 2
description: Pick a specialty type of lore. Gain +2 towards additional tests in that specialty. Ex) scientific, natural, military, historical, cultural, nautical, arcane, etc

name: Scholarship: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Int (Lore) tests.

name: Scouting: Rank 2
description: When taking a turn of keeping watch at night you gain +3 towards Perception checks to detect enemies.

name: Scouting: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Per (Tracking) tests.

name: Smithing: Rank 2
description:
Select any one type of ore. When smithing with that ore type you gain +2 to your Str (Smithing) test.
(this rank can be taken more than once, but only once per ore)

name: Smithing: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Str (Smithing) tests.

name: Sneaking: Rank 1
description: You are now able to move at your full movement speed while sneaking without penalty. This does not apply to sprinting.

name: Sneaking: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Dex (Stealth) tests.

name: Stealing: Rank 1
description: Not only are you able to pick pockets, but you now have the ability to plant items in the pockets or bags of others. You must make a successful Dex (Sleight of Hand) test to plant any item less than 1kg and smaller than 1 liter. Doing so gives the target +3 towards detecting you however.

name: Stealing: Rank 2
description: Successfully picking a lock once will allow you to automatically pick that exact lock again without needing to make a test no matter how much time has passed.

name: Stealing: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Dex (Sleight of Hand) tests.

name: Swimming: Rank 1
description: You do not need to make any rolls for holding your breath for the first 2 rounds (or 2 minutes)

name: Swimming: Rank 2
description: You now are able to swim at your normal movement speed.

name: Swimming: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll End (Swimming) tests.

name: Toughness: Rank 1
description: You no longer suffer any penalties to your Defense when injured or knocked prone during combat.

name: Toughness: Rank 2
description: Make an End (Pain Resistance) test after one of your body parts is targeted and wounded.  The TN is 11+ the targeting modifier. If you pass, you may ignore the effects of this injury for the remainder of the encounter.

name: Toughness: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll End (Pain Res) tests.

name: Weight Lifting: Rank 2
description: You automatically pass the Str (Lifting) test for everything less than 100 kg.

name: Weight Lifting: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Str (Lifting) tests.

name: Wrestling: Rank 2
description: You can now perform a take down for 3 doubles points after making brawling attack.

name: Wrestling: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Str (Grappling) tests.

name: Zen: Rank 1
description: Take some time to contemplate your life and evaluate your purpose. When succeeding a TN 16 Hrt (Meditation) test after a major life event (GM Discretion), you gain a Conviction Point.

name: Zen: Rank 2
description: After at least 3 hours of uninterrupted meditation and succeeding a TN 14 Hrt (Meditation) test, you may convert a single Conviction Point into a Level Up Point or vice-versa.

name: Zen: Rank 3
description: Gain advantage whenever you roll Hrt (Meditation) tests.

name: Dantalion's Fortune
description: When you are emotionally triggered during roleplaying/exploration scenarios you generate additional doubles points equal to your Hrt (Faith) focus bonus when you roll doubles.

name: Dantalion's Favor
description: When you are emotionally triggered during combat scenarios you generate additional doubles points equal to your Hrt (Faith) focus bonus when you roll doubles.

name: Dantalion's Blessing
description: During combat, whenever you miss an attack or fail an ability test gain a bonus equal to your Hrt + Faith towards your next ability test or attack roll.

name: Baal's Fortune
description: Once per encounter you may swap your place in the initiative order with an ally.

name: Baal's Favor
description: You may now add your Hrt + Faith to your Per (Inititative) tests

name: Baal's Blessing
description: Once per day you may change every aspect of your physical appearance for a number of minutes equal to your Hrt + Faith bonus. This change is undetectable by arcana.

name: Seir's Fortune
description: All allies within 5m of you restore additional HP equal to your Hrt + Faith whenever they receive healing from any source.

name: Seir's Favor
description: Once per day if an adjacent ally falls into a dying state you may immediately stabilize them.

name: Seir's Blessing
description: Every round of combat, you restore HP equal to your Hrt (Faith) focus bonus.

name: Blythe's Fortune
description: Whenever you successfully land a stealth attack, you deal bonus arcane damage equivalent to your Hrt + Faith.

name: Blythe's Favor
description: Preemptively attacking a perceived threat in cold blood outside of a combat encounter grants you an arcane damage bonus equal to your Hrt + Faith.

name: Blythe's Blessing
description: When declaring a targeting attack against a specific body part you may increase your attack roll by an amount equal to your Hrt (Faith) focus bonus.

name: Morax's Fortune
description: When fighting against those you have caught breaking their word, you gain an additional arcane damage bonus equal to your Hrt + Faith.

name: Morax's Favor
description: Once per day you may add your Hrt + Faith bonus towards any one roll that will aid you in upholding a contract, oath, or the law.

name: Morax's Blessing
description: Whenever you fulfill an oath gain a temporary bonus to your attribute scores for a number of rounds equal to your Hrt (Faith) focus bonus. The bonus value is at the GM's discretion (related to the difficulty of the promise)

name: Asmodeus' Fortune
description: If you enter combat with maximum HP, you will be granted a temporary physical armor bonus equal to your Hrt + Faith bonus. This lasts until you receive physical damage.

name: Asmodeus' Favor
description: If you enter combat with maximum MP, you will be granted a temporary arcane armor bonus equal to your Hrt + Faith bonus. This lasts until you receive arcane damage.

name: Asmodeus' Blessing
description: Asmodeus's Fortune and Favor now last the entire encounter.

name: Aster's Fortune
description: Gain a bonus to Dex (Sleight of Hand) or Dex (Acrobatics) equal to your Hrt + Faith towards escaping capture.

name: Aster's Favor
description: You may now add your Hrt + Faith bonus to your movement speed.

name: Aster's Blessing
description: When there are no enemies within 10m of you, gain defense equal to your Hrt (Faith) focus bonus.

name: Zagan's Fortune
description: You may choose to go last in the initiative order. If you do you may gain a number of extra minor actions equal to your Hrt + Faith  bonus during this combat encounter. You may only use one extra minor action per turn.

name: Zagan's Favor
description: When you are last in the initiative order you may perform the prepare action as a free action insead of a minor action.

name: Zagan's Blessing
description: For every creature you witness take their turn before you each round, gain bonus arcane damage equal to your Hrt (Faith) focus bonus. This effect resets each round of combat.

name: Anti-theist's Fortune
description: Gain a bonus to Cha (Persuasion) equal to your Hrt + Faith towards convincing others of the folley of the Constellations.

name: Anti-theist's Favor
description: Gain bonus physical and arcane armor equal to your Hrt + Faith bonus towards those who serve the constellations.

name: Anti-theist's Gift
description: Gain bonus physical damage equal to your Hrt + Faith bonus when attacking those who serve the constellations.

name: Anti-theist's Blessing
description: Whenever a follower of a constellation uses a power against you via a Hrt (Faith) test, you may make an opposed Hrt (Faith) test. If you succeed, then you negate the effects of the ability they were trying to use.

name: Anti-Paladin: Rank 2
description: When interacting with worshipers of the Constellations gain a bonus to your Charisma equal to your Hrt (faith) focus bonus.

name: Anti-Paladin: Rank 4
description: You recieve half damage from all damage sources that take power from the constellations. (normal elemental damage does not count).

name: Anti-Paladin: Rank 6
description: All damage from your melee or ranged weapons deals additional arcane damage equal to your Hrt+Faith bonus.

name: Anti-Paladin: Rank 8
description: Gain advantage on Hrt (Faith) tests.
